suggest.amasty\/module-payrestriction-mftf-2: Install module-payrestriction-mftf-2 module to be able to run Payment Restrictions MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version.
suggest.amasty\/module-payrestriction-mftf-3: Install module-payrestriction-mftf-3 module to be able to run Payment Restrictions MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
